message.body: Hey Graham, hows it goin? I hope your summers been going well. Im freshly back from Buenos Aires. Could I use you as a reference to apply to the Migrant Education Program?
Also, you and Molly should come see Vermont Joy Parade at Radiobean tonight

Sounds good! And yes go for it. Let me know if you need a letter. What are your plans for winter? Will you be interested in the jazz band again? Anyways I just arrived back from Ghana yesterday. You will have to come over and check out my new instruments and we could share stories. Be well brother!
Awesome, thanks. Yeah, i am interested in the jazz band again. Will it start in winter again? Welcome back! Joy parade starts at 10 if youre up for kickin it to some joyful tunes
